name: Quest of Eternity: Keys of Time
name_original: Quest of Eternity: Keys of Time
description:
(Downloads are currently disabled)

 The volumes and episodes have all been pretty different from each other; even the names, which makes it hard to track them down. I wouldn't even recommend trying. Most people won't understand this game. It is a simple mystery for meditation.

It may be able to help you. If you are interested; enter here.
